body.title: Pages of Jmol Project at SourceForge

section.title: The jmol-users mailing list
section.p: The jmol-users@lists.sourceforge.net mailing list is for general discussion of Jmol issues. Only list members may post to the list.
Click here to subscribe or unsubscribe to this list.
For a history of messages that have been posted you may browse the jmol-users mailing list archives at SourceForge or one of its mirrors: The Mail Archive.

section.title: The jmol-developers mailing list
section.p: The jmol-developers@lists.sourceforge.net mailing list is for specific discussion of Jmol software development issues.
We assume that all subscribers to jmol-developers are also subscribers to jmol-users. Therefore, messages should not be posted to both lists.
Click here to subscribe or unsubscribe to this list.
For a history of messages that have been posted you may browse the jmol-developers mailing list archives at SourceForge or one of its mirrors: The Mail Archive.

p.a: Bug database and reporting of bugs
